Package task5.impl

Class MessageQueueImpl

java.lang.Object
task5.MessageQueue
task5.impl.MessageQueueImpl
public final class MessageQueueImpl extends MessageQueue
An implementation of the MessageQueue abstract working on top of a Channel.

  • Method Details

    • send

      public void send(Message message, MessageQueue.WriteListener listener)
      Description copied from class: MessageQueue
      Sends a Message to the remote peer.
      This is a non-blocking operation that will return immediately, triggering the MessageQueue.WriteListener.written(Message, MessageQueue) once the message is fully sent.
      Specified by:
      send in class MessageQueue
      Parameters:
      message - the message to be sent.
      listener - the listener to handle the completion of the send operation.

    • setListener

      public void setListener(MessageQueue.ReadListener listener)
      Description copied from class: MessageQueue
      Registers a MessageQueue.ReadListener to handle incoming messages and connection lifecycle events.
      Only one listener can be registered at a time. Calling this method again will replace the existing listener.
      Specified by:
      setListener in class MessageQueue
      Parameters:
      listener - the listener to handle received messages.

    • close

      public void close()
      Description copied from class: MessageQueue
      Closes the connection and stops message exchange.
      After calling this method, no further messages can be sent or received.
      Specified by:
      close in class MessageQueue
